pages.text: As you do things, you get better at them. TFC represents this through $(thing)skills, which can be viewed on one of the inventory tabs.

$(thing)Skills$()$(br2)$(l:basic_smithing/prospecting)Prospecting: $()Reduces rate of false negatives when prospecting. Must click on ore blocks with prospector's pick at least 192 blocks apart to level up.$(br)$(l:basic_smithing/anvil)Smithing:$() Increases the more you use the anvil. Gives tools a smithing bonus, which makes them last longer and work harder.$(br)

$(l:food/farming)Agriculture:$() Increases the more crops you break. Improves drops from mature crops.$(br)$(l:food/animal_husbandry)Butchering:$() Increases when you kill an animal. Improves loot from animals (such as the amount of meat).
